description: A versatile WhatsApp bot powered by Node.js and Baileys, designed for multi-functional tasks.

SESSION_ID.description: Paste your SESSION_ID here to activate the bot.

PREFIX.description: Choose the prefix for your bot commands (examples: ., !, #, $, +, ~).

OWNER_NAME.description: The name of the bot owner.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Add owner number(s) without the plus sign. Use commas for multiple numbers.

AUTHOR.description: Name to display on sticker packs.

PUBLIC.description: Choose whether your bot is public or private.

AUTO_REACT.description: Enable or disable auto reactions to messages.

AUTO_REACT_MODE.description: Set auto-react mode: dm, gc, both, or off.

ANTIDELETE.description: Set to true if you want to see deleted messages.

AUTO_VIEW_STATUS.description: Enable to auto-view WhatsApp status updates.

CHATBOT.description: Turn this on for chatbot-style auto replies.

AUTO_READ_MESSAGES.description: Enable auto-reading of messages in groups.

AUTO_READ_PM_NGC.description: Enable auto-reading of private messages and non-group chats.

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Make it true if you want auto recording indicator.

AUTO_REPLY.description: Make it true if you want automatic reply.

ANTICALL.description: Block users who try to call the bot.

MAX_WARNINGS.description: Maximum number of warnings before taking action.

WELCOME.description: Enable welcome messages for new group members.

AUTO_BIO_INTERVAL.description: Interval for auto bio updates (in minutes).
